import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.c4e110fe:
Age = data['Age'].mean()
data['Age']=data['Age'].fillna(Age)

Expedition = data['Expedition'].mode()
data['Expedition']=data['Expedition'].fillna(Expedition)

Nationality = data['Nationality'].mode()
data['Nationality']=data['Nationality'].fillna(Nationality)

Location  =data['Location'].mode()
data['Location']=data['Location'].fillna(Location)

Cause_of_death = data['Cause of death'].mode()
data['Cause of death']= data['Cause of death'].fillna(Cause_of_death)
source.19a9b068:
color=['#000000','#FF0000']
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))
sns.barplot(x=data['Age'].value_counts().index,y=data['Age'].value_counts().values,palette=color,edgecolor='#000080')
plt.xlabel('Age',weight='bold')
plt.tick_params(labelleft=False,left=False)
plt.title('40 Age of person more deaths in mount-everest-climbing')
plt.suptitle('Age Distripution',weight='bold',fontname='monospace',fontsize=20)

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))

plt.xlabel('year',weight='bold')
plt.tick_params(axis='x',labelsize=10,rotation=90)
plt.tick_params(labelleft=False,left=False)
plt.title('2015 year more deaths in mount-everest-climbing')
plt.suptitle('Year Distripution',weight='bold',fontname='monospace',fontsize=20)

**Climbing Seasons of Everest**
                 The 6 Weather Periods of EVEREST (not defined)
1. Summer                Very We                            June 7 to Sep 30 
2. *Autumn              Window  Dry, Warm, Calm          Oct 1 to Oct 20**
3. Autumn                Very Windy, Cold, Very Dry, Dark   Oct 20 to Nov 30
4. Winter                Very Windy, Very Cold, Dry, Dark   Dec 1 to Feb 28
5. Spring                Windy, Cold, Dry                   Mar 1 to May 20
6. **Spring Window       Dry, Warm, Calm                    May 20 to June 6
